description:
The http://anidb.net/ch123016 [Aerial] has been renovated by the http://anidb.net/ch127174 [Shin Sei Development Corporation]. As well as repairs to the damage it suffered in the duel with http://anidb.net/ch125790 [Grassley House], it has received updates and additions to its external armor and equipment.
Source: Official page
name: XVX-016RN Gundam Aerial (Kaishu-gata)
